name: Top of Mattress Bed Rail
short_description: It offers additional security by attaching at the top of the mattress instead of adjacent to the mattress like traditional style bed rails.
description: It offers additional security by attaching at the top of the mattress instead of adjacent to the mattress like traditional style bed rails. A colour coded safety position indicator lets the parent know when properly positioned and locked. Eliminates possible entrapment between bed and bed rail. The bed rail meets ASTM bed rail standards and cannot be used in place of a crib or on a bunk bed or a bed with inflatable mattress.

name: Custodian X
short_description: A safe booster carseat for your toddler.
description: The Custodian X features large side wings for maximum side impact protection enhanced to include retractable cup holders to store drinks and snacks and silicon arm rests to protect your little ones arms from the heat.

name: Sentry Harnessed Carseat
short_description: Fully harnessed booster seat for your child.
description: Child remains fully harnessed from 6 months to 8 years of age providing extra protection for an additional 4 years.

name: Apex
short_description: The Apex Unharnessed Booster Seat provides exceptional protection for your child. Suitable for children 4 years to 8 years of age. Featuring Air Protect ® Superior Side Impact Protection, and ventilated mesh sides, this seat will keep your child comfortable in summer months. Parents and children will love the large easy access cup holders that will help keeps drink spillages off your vehicles seats, giving you more time to Discover Life Safely.
description: The Apex Unharnessed Booster Seat provides exceptional protection for your child. Suitable for children 4 years to 8 years of age. Featuring Air Protect ® Superior Side Impact Protection, and ventilated mesh sides, this seat will keep your child comfortable in summer months. Parents and children will love the large easy access cup holders that will help keeps drink spillages off your vehicles seats, giving you more time to Discover Life Safely.

name: Prime AP
short_description: The Safety 1st Prime AP is a convertible booster seat which will protect your child from 6 months up to approximately 8 years.
description: The Safety 1st Prime AP is a convertible booster seat which will protect your child from 6 months up to approximately 8 years.Featuring Air Protect, your child will be protected by our superior side impact technology in the instance of an accident.The included infant Insert and harness pads feature our NEW Natural Antibacterial Protection which will keep your child healthy by inhibiting the growth of harmful bacteria and odour.The ventilated air mesh sides on the Safety 1st Prime AP Convertible Booster Seat means that your child will be cooler in hot summer months as well!The Safety 1st Prime AP Convertible Booster Seat is designed with a new narrow base to enable 3 car seats to fit across the back seat of a standard vehicle for parents with multiple children.

name: Summit ISO AP
short_description: The Summit ISO AP is our most innovative convertible car seat, that grows with your child. Easily converting from a rearward-facing to forward-facing seat, the Summit ISO AP also has an easy inbuilt harness system, and a one hand recline for comfort feature.Featuring ISOGO , Air Protect ® Advanced Side Impact Protection, and our NEW Natural Antibacterial Protection which inhabits the growth of bacteria caused by perspiration, spills or accidents, this car seat is suitable for children aged newborn to approx 4 years of age. The Summit ISO AP is exclusive to Baby Bunting.
description: The Summit ISO AP is our most innovative convertible car seat, that grows with your child. Easily converting from a rearward-facing to forward-facing seat, the Summit ISO AP also has an easy inbuilt harness system, and a one hand recline for comfort feature.Featuring ISOGO , Air Protect ® Advanced Side Impact Protection, and our NEW Natural Antibacterial Protection which inhabits the growth of bacteria caused by perspiration, spills or accidents, this car seat is suitable for children aged newborn to approx 4 years of age. The Summit ISO AP is exclusive to Baby Bunting.

name: Summit AP
short_description: The Summit AP convertible car seat gives your little one the best possible protection from birth to approx 4 years of age. Featuring Air Protect ® Superior Side Impact Protection, and our NEW Natural Antibacterial Protection which inhabits the growth of bacteria caused by perspiration, spills or accidents, this convertible car seat is your safest option for both rearward facing and forward facing positions, allowing you to keep your child rearward facing for 12 months. The Summit AP has an inbuilt 5 position headrest adjustment and a one hand recline for comfort feature.
description: The Summit AP convertible car seat gives your little one the best possible protection from birth to approx 4 years of age. The Summit AP has an inbuilt 5 position headrest adjustment and a one hand recline for comfort feature.

name: Rhombus Portacot & Playpen
short_description: Safe and stylish playpen for your child to play and sleep in.
description: Featuring a unique octagonal design, the Rhombus provides spacious play area while occupying less floor space. Lightweight, easy to use, carry and store is ideal for sleep time or playtime.

name: OUTLET PLUG PROTECTORS (24 PACK)
short_description: A home safety essential. Eliminate the threat of electrical shock
description: This set of Outlet Plug Protectors are designed to protect curious tots from electrical shock. Each durable plastic plug fits into any standard Australian outlet, prohibiting children from putting fingers or small objects into the socket.

name: SAFETY 1ST SHELL NIGHTLIGHT WITH SENSOR SWITCH - 2 PACK
short_description: For a warm glow that automatically illuminates when the main light is turned off.
description: This Shell Nightlight provides a soft-glowing light to allow parents to easily check on baby at night without waking them with a full strength light source.

name: SAFETY 1ST SHELL NIGHTLIGHT WITH SENSOR SWITCH - 1 PACK
short_description: For a warm glow that automatically illuminates when the main light is turned off.
description: This Shell Nightlight provides a soft-glowing light to allow parents to easily check on baby at night without waking them with a full strength light source.

name: CABINET SLIDE LOCK (LONG)
short_description: Easy to use, essential home safety. Protect your baby from cabinet contents with this adjustable slide lock.
description: Help to keep your curious crawler from accessing an off-limit side by side cabinet with a sturdy Cabinet Slide Lock. It installs easily to the handles or knobs of the cabinet and helps keep your child away from the contents inside.

name: ULTRA SECURE CABINET & DRAWER LATCHES (4 PACK)
short_description: A genius way to ensure home safety without sacrificing ease of access for adults.
description: This Ultra Secure Cabinet & Drawer Latch keeps children out of cabinets and drawers and is spring loaded for durability and long lasting use. Unique fold down feature allows the cabinet latch to be disengaged when not in use. Great for use at the Grandparents house or between children.

name: CABINET FLEX LOCK (2PK)
short_description: A simple 3 step removal process is easy for adult hands but safely secures cabinet doors from curious little hands.
description: This three way locking system of the Cabinet Flex Lock will help prevent toddlers from opening two handled cabinets. The easy to install system requires no tools. The three step removal process makes it difficult for little hands.

name: GRIP N GO CABINET LOCK (2 PACK)
short_description: Easy to use, essential home safety. Protect your baby from cabinet contents with the grip n go.
description: The Grip N Go Cabinet Lock keeps little hands out of cabinets. For peace of mind the SecureTech technology lets you know when the lock had been secured correctly. Can be used on knobs or handles in kitchens and bathrooms.

name: WIDE GRIP LATCHES (7 PACK)
short_description: A less obvious lock for curious little hands. Hidden inside the doors to preserve aesthetics.
description: The Wide Grip Latches help keep cabinets off limits to little ones. The easy wide grip surface provides quick access for parents and they are simple to install and easy to use.

name: PROGRADE FLAT SCREEN TV LOCK
short_description: Protect your chidren and TV.
description: The ProGrade Flat Screen TV Lock from Safety 1st secures your free standing flat screen TV so that it doesn't topple over on your little ones!

name: PROGRADE PIVOT POSITION CABINET & DRAWER LATCHES (4PK)
short_description: Keep children out of cabinets with these versatile latches.
description: Help keep your curious child from opening cabinets and drawers with ProGrade Pivot Position Cabinet and Drawer Latches by Safety 1st. The versatile design mounts vertically or horizontally and folds conveniently flat and out-of-the-way when not in use.

name: SECURETECH CABINET LOCK (2 PACK)
short_description: Keep children out of cabinets with these versatile latches.
description: The SecureTech Cabinet Lock features and easy-to-understand indicator that lets you know when it's locked. This sturdy cabinet lock helps keep children out of cabinets that are off limits.

name: PUSH N SNAP CABINET LOCK (2 PACK)
short_description: Keep children out of cabinets with these push and snap locks.
description: SecureTech technology lets you know that the lock is activated.Can be used in the kitchen or bathroom on knobs and handles. All you need to do is Push and Snap.

description: The Adjustable Multi-Purpose Strap cuts down on kitchen mishaps by keeping toddlers out of kitchen appliances. The new design offers improved function and styling to blend in with modern appliances, draws and cupboards.

short_description: Curious kids try to get into anything and everything, but the Safety 1st OutSmart‰ã¢ Multi Use Lock helps you keep them out with the first ever decoy button. Your child will think that the decoy button opens the lock, but pushing on it has no effect. You‰Ûªll know that the flexible surface hides the actual secret to opening the lock.
description: This multi-use lock prevents your little explorer from getting into a variety of appliances and can be used to secure cabinets. It is easily attached with an adhesive and is removable when the lock is no longer required.

name: OUTSMART FLEX LOCK
short_description: Curious kids try to get into anything and everything, but the Safety 1st OutSmart‰ã¢ Flex Lock helps you keep them out with the first ever decoy button. Your child will think that the decoy button opens the lock, but pushing it has no effect. You‰Ûªll know that the flexible surface hides the actual secret to opening the lock.
description: This cabinet lock prevents your little explorer from getting into side-by-side cabinets and can be used on cabinets with either knobs or handle pulls. It installs easily with no drilling required. The adjustable straps let you get a customized fit for cabinets with hardware up to 8 inches apart. For periods of non-use, this cabinet lock hangs conveniently out of the way, but stays close for when it‰Ûªs needed again.

name: OUTSMART SLIDE LOCK
short_description: Curious kids try to get into anything and everything, but the Safety 1st OutSmart‰ã¢ Slide Lock helps you keep them out with the first ever decoy button. Your child will think that the decoy button opens the lock, but pushing it has no effect. You‰Ûªll know that the flexible surface hides the actual secret to opening the lock.
description: This cabinet lock prevents your little explorer from getting into side-by-side cabinets and can be used on cabinets with large knobs or handle pulls. It installs easily with no drilling required and you only need one hand to operate. The OutSmart Slide Lock is designed to work with hardware up to 4.5‰Û_ apart.

name: WINDOW BLIND CORD WINDUPS 2PK
short_description: Safety 1st takes care of the hazards before you even realise there is one. These essential blind cord winds ups take the risk out of loose cords.
description: Safety 1st Window Blind Cord Wind-Ups help you keep your baby from playing with dangling blind cords. The Cord Wind-Ups safely stores excess cords out of your child's reach, but won't interfere with the use of your blinds.

name: CORNER CUSHION (4 PACK)
short_description: Essential baby protection for around the home. Preventing corner impact injury during activity.
description: Protect your active children from sharp corners with our Furniture Corner Cushions. This set of four corner cushions adhere to the corners of tables or counter tops to protect your children from injury. Self adhesive or can be screwed into place for extra durabilty. Clear rubber gel to preserve furniture aesthetics.

name: FINGER PINCH GUARD (2 PACK)
short_description: Protect your child's finger from getting pinched in a closing door.
description: Protect little fingers with our Finger Pinch Guard.Attach this child proofing aid to household doors to prevent your children from accidentally pinching their fingers in a closing door.

name: GRIP N TWIST DOOR KNOB COVER
short_description: Curious kids try to explore everywhere, but Safety 1st OutSmart‰ã¢ Knob Covers helps you keep them out with the first ever decoy button. Your child will think the decoy button will give access to the door knob, but pushing it has no effect. You‰Ûªll know that the flexible surface hides the actual secret to opening the door.
description: These door knob covers prevent your little explorer from accessing off-limit rooms. They easily snap around the door knob and can be operated with one adult hand by squeezing the flexible grips on the side. The decoy button won‰Ûªt do anything when pushed, but adults in the know can lift it up to reveal the door lock. This convenient pack of two knob covers lets you safeguard two doors in your home.

name: FUNRITURE WALL STRAP
short_description: The passive hazard large furniture poses is a real consideration when babyproofing your home. These straps help eliminate that risk.
description: Keep your little explorer safer while at home with Safety 1st Furniture Straps. These sturdy straps secure your furniture to the wall and help prevent your climbing child from accidentally tipping things over.

name: REFRIDGERATOR DOOR LOCK DECORE
short_description: large, heavy fridge doors are a risk to children, let alone the contents. Elminate the risk with this handy door lock.
description: Baby has already noticed your fridge contains all the good stuff. Help keep your curious toddler out of the fridge with the Safety 1st Refrigerator Door Lock. Designed to lay flat, the lock features a secure adhesive mount. This handy lock also works on freezer doors and easily disengages for periods of non-use.

name: EASY GRIP TOILET LOCK - 2PACK
short_description: Don‰Ûªt let your little one's curiosity allow them into the toilet by securing it shut with the easy grip toilet lock.
description: You know how curious little ones can be. Help keep your child from playing in the toilet or trying to flush toys by securing the lid firmly shut. The Easy Grip Toilet Lock is one-handed for quick release. It also removes easily for cleaning or periods of non-use. It's designed with a flexible strap that allows it to fit most toilets and has adhesive backing for easy installation.

name: TOP OF WINDOW & SLIDING DOOR LOCK
short_description: The essential home safety product for Australian summer. Lets you open the door 3 inches for airflow but locks it from any further movement.
description: The Safety 1st Sliding Door Child Lock prevents curious children from gaining access to off-limit areas. With the lock engaged, the door will only open 3 inches; enough to let in a cool breeze on a hot summer day but too narrow for a child to get through. The sleek design blends into the door frame, and top-of-the door installation makes it inaccessible to toddlers and young children. The lock easily disengages for periods of non use.

name: LEVER HANDLE LOCK NO DRILL
short_description: A great alternative to modifying lever door handles.
description: Help keep your little explorer in the child-friendly areas of your home with a No Drill Lever Handle Lock. This clever solution works with your door handle's natural motion for easy adult operation. The SecureTechå¨ locking indicator lets you see at a glance that the lock is in the secured position. The easy-to- mount design means there is no need to remove your doors hardware to install.

name: BATH TOY BAG
short_description: Like the rest of us.. Clutter can present a hazard. Keep the bathroom tidy and safe with this great toy bag.
description: The Bath Toy Bag neatly organises bath toys in one area, keeping the tub area clean and safe. Easy-mounting suction caps make the bag simple to install.

name: BATH PAL THERMOMETER (DUCK)
short_description: Fun and functional. Easy to read temperature gauge helps protect your child from burns.
description: The Bath Pal Thermometer easily and accurately reads bath water temperature to prevent injuries from scalding water.

short_description: slipping in the bathroom represents a real hazard. Make bathtime fun and safe at the same time with this essential bath mat.
description: The Froggy and Friends Bath Mat is designed to help keep your child secure, while sitting to bathe or standing to shower. Textured for extra grip and perforated to prevent float.

name: SOFT SPOUT COVER
short_description: Protect against the spout and hot water.

short_description: A fun non-slip bath mat for your child.
description: The Slip Resistant Bath Mats have been designed to prevent children from slipping in the bath tub.The three playful designs are appealing for both children and parents.

description: The Light-up Lobster TempGuard Gauge helps ensure the bath temperature is just right for your little one in a fun way.

description: Help prevent accidental bumps during bath time with the Whale and Baby Spout Guard from Safety 1st.

short_description: Softness is key on infant skin. Specially designed to be extra gentle.

name: CRADLE CAP CARE
short_description: Important protection and remedy to Cradle Cap in this all in one kit.
description: The Safety 1st Cradle Cap Care kit provides parents with the tools needed to aid in removing cradle cap, from mild to severe.‰ÛÜ

name: 3-PIECE MEDICINE SET
short_description: Dosage and delivery is important in infant medicine. This kit has 3 different tools to make life easier and more accurate.
description: This convenient medicine set contains three medicine dispensing options for your sick child.

name: CLEAR TIP NASAL ASPIRATOR
short_description: Another essential infant health product from Safety 1st. Newly redesigned with improved ergonomics.
description: The Clear Tip Nasal Aspirator has improved compression and finger grooves for proper finger placement to meet the needs of parent and baby. The aspirator contains many features that make suction easy and safe for baby.

name: CLEAR VIEW TWEEZERS AND NAIL CLIPPER
short_description: For accurate removal of splinters and trimming of nails.
description: The Safety 1st Clear ViewTweezer and Nail Clipper Comboprovides you with deluxe tweezers and nail clippers.Both come with a 5x magnifying glass to help ensure accurate splinter removal and nail clipping.

name: BOTTLE MEDICINE DISPENSER
short_description: An easy way to feed your baby medicine.
description: The Safety 1st Bottle Medicine Dispenser easily dispenses medicine in a familiar way. Just remove the top, fill to desired dosage and snap the top back on. It's as easy as 1-2-3!

name: NO SCRATCH MITTENS (2 PACK)
short_description: Mittens to prevent babies from accidentally scratching themselves.
description: Baby's little nails can be sharp.No Scratch Mittens were designed to help prevent infants from accidentally scratching themselves.The soft cotton material is comfortable for babyand the elastic wrist bands keep them securelyin place.

name: STEADY GRIP NAIL CLIPPER
short_description: Ergonomic designed nail clippers for ease of use.
description: The premium Hospital's Choice Steady Grip Nail Clippers are specially designed with curved cutting edges to easily trim nails closely. New ergonomic design allows for ease of use and comfortable grip.

name: ADVANCED SOLUTIONS - ELECTRONIC NASAL ASPIRATOR
short_description: An electronic nasal aspirator for your baby's quick and gently relief from congestion.
description: Give your baby quick and gentle relief from congestion with the advanced solutions electronic nasal aspirator. The electronic function means no need to reposition the aspirator multiple times making the process easier for both you and your baby. The aspirator includes 4 soft and hygienic silicone tips. Contoured shape of aspirator body is easy to hold and the soft silicone tips can be easily sterilized. Quietly and efficiently removes excess mucus and the clear reservoir lets you know it's working. Auto shut off means aspirator stops when you want it to, while also preserving battery life.

The thermometer package includes a handy Fever Chart which you can use for easy reference.

name: FEVERFLASH 1 SECOND THERMOMETER
short_description: Fast reading thermometer.

With a large digital display and our Fever Light bar that lights up when children have a fever, you'll know right away if your child's temperature has risen above normal. The thermometer also features a handy memory recall to help you keep track of the past 12 readings.

name: 3 PIECE ORAL GROW WITH ME KIT
short_description: All in one to help make the transition to adult toothbrush easier.

Start with a fingertip toothbrush that is great for softly stimulating gums during teething which includes a case for storage. The toddler toothbrush is designed with an chunky handle, making it easy for little hands to get a good grip.

name: BABY CARE BASICS
short_description: The must have kit for baby care.
description: Get four essential items to care for your baby in one convenient package with Baby Care Basics by Safety 1st. The brush with soft bristles and fine-tooth comb help tame unruly hair. The fold up nail clippers are sized just right for your child's smaller nails. The nasal aspirator features a small, flexible tip making it comfortable for your baby. These are four basics no nursery or diaper bag should be without.
features:
4 Essentials for bringing baby home

name: Envy Stroller

description: The Safety 1st Envy Stroller is a multi-function stroller with a series of optional accessories to convert your Safety 1st Envy from a single to a double stroller or a complete travel system.

name: Visto
short_description: The Visto 4-Wheel Stroller is our vote for a feature packed, stylish stroller. The ultimate newborn travel stroller, the Visto is lightweight and features a compact fold, perfect for smaller vehicles. Other features include a fully reclinable seat for a newborn, height adjustable handle bar, lockable front wheels, linked one-foot brake, an extendable sun canopy with breathable mesh insert and viewing window. Parents will love the extra large shopping basket, and reversible seat liner, that allows you to change your Visto, depending on your mood.The Visto 4 is compatible with Maxi Cosi capsules (adaptors sold separately) and can be used from birth to approximately 4 years (17kg).
description: The Visto 4-Wheel Stroller is our vote for a feature packed, stylish stroller. The ultimate newborn travel stroller, the Visto is lightweight and features a compact fold, perfect for smaller vehicles. Other features include a fully reclinable seat for a newborn, height adjustable handle bar, lockable front wheels, linked one-foot brake, an extendable sun canopy with breathable mesh insert and viewing window. Parents will love the extra large shopping basket, and reversible seat liner, that allows you to change your Visto, depending on your mood.The Visto 4 is compatible with Maxi Cosi capsules (adaptors sold separately) and can be used from birth to approximately 4 years (17kg).Available in 3 colours - Dusk Grey, Sunset Red and Horizon Blue.

name: SAFETY HARNESS
short_description: busy public places makes it easy for your tot to get disctracted or lost. The safety harness makes life easier when out and about.
description: The Safety Harness is designed to keep tots close while shopping and travelling. It is made of soft, webbed material and adjusts to fit growing toddlers.

name: COMPLETE COVERAGE DELUXE ROLLER SHADE (2 PACK)
short_description: Keep baby cool and protected with this versatile deluxe roller shade.
description: This year round Roller Shade is designed to protect young children from the sun's dangerous rays. This durable shield may either be clipped onto a partially opened window or attached to a closed window with suction cups.

name: ORGANISER CLIP
short_description: Strong, easy to use carabiner clip with padding
description: The Organiser Clip is perfect for shopping trolleys. To collect all your parcels on one clip. Simply open, hook it on and you're ready to go!
